issue.message: Unfortunately there is a bug on the system, that is whenever I am not registerd in any course it does not show me any message.
I would suggest to update my name and put the Dr. title
I would like to have the feature of sending messages to the professsor implemented.
Sometimes when the systems ask me to press Enter, it sometimes require me to press more than once. Please correct this bug
I need to receive a notification whenever I have been assigned a new subject
Jsut checking if everything works finn3!
I have wroted some issues, yet it has been 3 months till then. I think there is a bug on the issues reader
I am voluntaring me for the math subject, if it is suitable please register me on it.
